body_html:
@drpngx Basically, I want to build a native binary on Android, which simply creates a graph with some ops and execute it with some random input. The benchmark is a good example which can run on Android, but it just reads the graph from disk without constructing its own graph. From what I've found via the benchmark_model_test and label_image examples, I need to include apis under //tensorflow//cc to use ::tensorflow::ops::XXX (such as ResizeBilinear).
So my question is how to compile the //tensorflow/cc for Android? I didn't find any target inside //tensorflow/cc.BUILD, and failed to build it by myself.
I'm kind of new on this so maybe it's a very stupid question :)
